thread.title: Rome mayor resigns over expense-account scandal

title: Rome mayor resigns over expense-account scandal
text:
Published By: CBS News - Today 
Ignazio Marino says he's being made a scapegoat for rooting out mafia infiltration in city hall, vows to expose the truth...
